title: Waiver Wire! Penny, Osborn and Some Week 16 Help (12/14 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Rashaad Penny will be the most added player but does his Week 15 matchup against the Rams make him a Fantasy sit? We'll tell you our top priorities (7:30) as we try to sort out some confusing backfields and give you your news and notes (12:50). There is a lot of news! ... Top priorities at each position: QB (19:40), RB (21:50), WR (28:15), TE (30:30) DST (32:30), Kicker and IDP. We are excited for Tua Tagovailoa. Which backfield are we targeting on the waiver wire? Dolphins? Lions? Eagles? Is K.J. Osborn a must-start player this week? Can Austin Hooper give us a repeat performance? ... If you have a bye this week or just want to look ahead, we'll give you some Week 16 options (38:10). Then we recap Rams-Cardinals (42:00), get the Dropometer out (47:30) and get back into the waiver wire (51:00) with more options at each position ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Waiver Wire! Penny, Osborn and Some Week 16 Help (12/14 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Rashaad Penny, all of the backfield uncertainty in PHI/DET/MIA, DeVante Parker vs. KJ Osborn vs. Amon-Ra St. Brown, and options at TE, DST, Kicker and IDP. We also give you some Week 16 stashes
